channel.title: Selling silab items in a shop?
channel.description:
Is it possible to make shops for skillcapes??? if so see this:
Ok i added the shop stuff(shop.cfg): [code]shop = 42 @cya@Supplies@cya@ 1 1 391 5000 3751 2000 3749 2000 3753 3000 3755 2000 1127 2000 1079 2000 1093 2000 1163 2000 7535 5000 7460 2000 7461 5000 7462 5000 5574 500 5575 500 5576 500 3105 5000 6524 5000 6568 5000 6106 500 6107 1000 6108 1000 6109 1000 6110 1000 6111 1000 2436 100 2440 100 2442 100 2434 100 2446 100 3024 100 4835 10000 shop = 43 @blu@Skill Shop@blu@ 2 2 14073 100 14074 100 14075 100 14076 100 14077 100 14078 100 14079 100 14080 100 14081 100 14082 100 14083 100 14084 100 14085 100 14086 100 14087 100 14088 100 14089 100 14090 100 14091 100 14092 100 [ENDOFSHOPLIST] [/code] I added the ppl(autospawn.cfg): [code]spawn = 70 3251 3438 0 0 0 0 0 1 Suplies spawn = 461 3252 3438 0 0 0 0 0 1 Skill shop [ENDOFSPAWNLIST][/code] And i added the shops under wanneshop = 30 or w\e(client.java): [code] else if (NPCID == 461) { // Magic Store owner PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; //Skill Shop } else if (NPCID == 70) { // Turael PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; //Suplies }[/code] But when i go to trade with them It doesnt go to the shops??? Why?

item.title: Selling silab items in a shop?

item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

[quote=“kiwon, post:5, topic:170977”]why not just edit a shop you already have?

its easier -.-[/quote]
lol yea ill do that

item.title: Selling silab items in a shop?
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

tobias222:

because you added them most likely in /* first click npc */ , that means you have to click talk to , search for second click npc and add under there

I didnt add anything under any of those things can u help me what to do?

Read full topic

item.title: Selling silab items in a shop?
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

Is it possible to make shops for skillcapes??? if so see this:

Ok i added the shop stuff(shop.cfg):

shop = 42 @cya@Supplies@cya@ 1 1 391 5000 3751 2000 3749 2000 3753 3000 3755 2000 1127 2000 1079 2000 1093 2000 1163 2000 7535 5000 7460 2000 7461 5000 7462 5000 5574 500 5575 500 5576 500 3105 5000 6524 5000 6568 5000 6106 500 6107 1000 6108 1000 6109 1000 6110 1000 6111 1000 2436 100 2440 100 2442 100 2434 100 2446 100 3024 100 4835 10000 shop = 43 @blu@Skill Shop@blu@ 2 2 14073 100 14074 100 14075 100 14076 100 14077 100 14078 100 14079 100 14080 100 14081 100 14082 100 14083 100 14084 100 14085 100 14086 100 14087 100 14088 100 14089 100 14090 100 14091 100 14092 100 [ENDOFSHOPLIST]
I added the ppl(autospawn.cfg):

spawn = 70 3251 3438 0 0 0 0 0 1 Suplies spawn = 461 3252 3438 0 0 0 0 0 1 Skill shop [ENDOFSPAWNLIST]
And i added the shops under wanneshop = 30 or w\e(client.java):

else if (NPCID == 461) { // Magic Store owner PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; //Skill Shop } else if (NPCID == 70) { // Turael PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; //Suplies }
But when i go to trade with them It doesnt go to the shops???
Why?

Read full topic
